oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the L\'evy-Khinchin decomposition of generating functionals
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Franz, Uwe
Gerhold, Malte
Thom, Andreas
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Probability
Mathematics - Functional Analysis
Mathematics - Operator Algebras
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study several sufficient conditions for the existence of a L\'evy-Khinchin decomposition of generating functionals. We show that none of these conditions are equivalent and we show that such a decomposition does not always exist.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Communications on Stochastic Analysis, Vol 9, nr 4, pp. 529-544, December 2015
